https://www.billboard.com/articles/columns/chart-beat/8500641/lady-gaga-bradley-cooper-shallow-hot-100-projection?utm_source=twitter&utm_source=t.co&utm_medium=referral

replies.msg:
"Shallow" should vault from 9.6 million U.S. streams to over 25 million and from 35,000 downloads sold to over 100,000, easily making it the top-selling song of the week.

"Shallow" will also likely increase in radio airplay after logging 26.6 million audience impressions in the tracking week ending Feb. 24.

Thus, while "7 Rings" will outperform "Shallow" in streaming and airplay, the latter's leaps in all three metrics, especially streaming and sales, could be enough for it to overtake the Hot 100's incumbent No. 1.
